Get the most out of your people, processes and data

Helping businesses implement digital technologies in order to scale, reduce costs, optimize operations, and improve customer experiences.

View Profile

Need help with implementing Software and Automating Business Process?

All successful businesses in every industry are continually investing in improving their business processes and implementing software to stay current and get ahead of their competition.
Are you thinking of implementing a software into your business, or are you in the middle of a software project? Thinking of documenting or improving your business processes?
If either of those questions apply to you, book a 30 minute strategy call, and let's discuss how I can help. We will go over your current business and I will walk you through my methodology and how it can help you achieve your goals no matter where you are in the digital transformation journey.

yes, i want to work with neil

IT Strategy
Are you looking to reinvent and strategically reposition your business in today’s digital economy? Are you aiming to align technology and operations with your business vision? I help business owners and executives develop a plan, and set goals for how technologies will be implemented and used to meet key business objectives. We will define and prioritize your IT initiatives, and outline steps you have to take to turn your vision into a reality. As a result you will have a well thought out technology program that, when executed, will help you drive value, achieve competitive advantages, and improve customer experiences. Book a call, and let's see how I can help!
Process Improvement
Would you like to get the most out of your time and resources? I can help you assess and understand the current state of your business, and discover the processes that need attention the most. Measure performance, and compare it against your goals and benchmarks to identify areas of improvement. Optimize and standardize critical processes to maximize the productivity and efficiency of the work performed in your business. This will give you the ability to meet a greater demand, and consistently provide better customer experience. Book a time in my calendar and we can discuss how I can help in your problematic areas!
Software Projects
Do you need help executing your software projects? Want to know if your project plan is sound, if your team is capable of executing the project, or if your project execution is set up to deliver a top quality product on time, and within the budget? Are you making the best choice for technologies to solve your business problems; should you buy or build a product? Are your requirements defined properly, and is your design ready to move into production? All of these are important questions to consider when executing a software project. Book a call and we can discuss your project, as well as how to ensure it's setup for success!

Why ME?

My name is Gordan Miklausevic. I am a Certified Business Analysis Professional with 24 years of experience in the software industry, designing and implementing solutions in a variety of businesses ranging from engineering, large producers, and supply chain, to fintech, health, insurance, and retail, including SaaS startups.

My approach in helping businesses achieve business objectives is based on utilizing my business acumen and technical skills to identify the core problem, propose the solution that best fits your exact needs, and oversee implementation to realize the benefits. I always address the following three areas to find the largest opportunity for improvement:

  • Leveraging data to measure performance and identify underlying issues
  • Optimizing and automating primary processes to improve data quality and increase efficiency
  • Building customer facing solutions to scale and improve customer experience

My core competencies are in fields of IT strategy, business process improvement, and software project execution. I specialize in:

  • Aligning technology initiatives to business objectives
  • Developing a technology roadmap
  • Measuring performance
  • Building Management Dashboards
  • Process optimization and automation
  • System integration
  • Defining project vision
  • Specifying conceptual solution
  • Project management
  • Software implementation and change management

Schedule a call and see how I can help.
